projects.title: GroofStreet – NFT Collection & P2E Game
projects.description: Demons are your friends! Groof Street is an NFT collection and P2E game developed by Max Acrone Studio. A strategic MMORPG set in the DevilTroid metaverse where players develop districts, recruit gangs, and battle for territory.
projects.content: Groof Street represents the embodiment of our vision to change the world through NFT art and gaming. Developed by Max Acrone Studio in 2022, this project combines a unique NFT collection with an innovative P2E (Play-to-Earn) game set in the DevilTroid metaverse. Players can develop their districts, recruit demon gangs, and engage in strategic battles for territory control. The game features multiple factions, farming systems, staking mechanics, and various battle modes including PVP and PVE. Each victory rewards players with $DTC tokens and district upgrades. The project also includes a DevilPass system for additional rewards and future features like Mutations, Area Defense, and DAO governance. Groof Street is more than just NFTs - it's a complete gaming ecosystem where demons are your friends and strategic thinking leads to victory.
projects.contribution: I led the overall project development, designed the strategic MMORPG mechanics, created the DevilTroid metaverse concept, and established partnerships with key gaming and blockchain platforms.
projects.goals: Create a revolutionary NFT collection combined with a strategic MMORPG that allows players to develop districts, recruit demon gangs, and battle for territory while earning rewards through play-to-earn mechanics.

projects.title: IslandInvest – AI Real Estate & Island Life Portal
projects.description: A cutting-edge AI-powered platform for discovering real estate, entertainment, and lifestyle opportunities on islands worldwide. Launched in Dubai with $2.5M in investments.
projects.content: IslandInvest is a next-generation portal that leverages artificial intelligence to help users find the best real estate, entertainment, and lifestyle options on islands around the globe. Developed for LoveMark and based in Dubai, the project has already attracted $2.5 million in investments. The platform features a smart AI assistant that analyzes user preferences and delivers personalized recommendations, making the search for property and experiences seamless and inspiring. IslandInvest is more than a search engine—it's an ecosystem for living and investing in paradise.
projects.contribution: As CTO, I led the technical architecture, implemented AI algorithms, managed the engineering team, and oversaw integration with external services.
projects.goals: To create the world's best AI-powered portal for real estate and island living.

projects.title: NFT Studio – Web3 & Blockchain Solutions
projects.description: A leading studio for Web3, NFT, and blockchain development. Over 250 successful projects delivered in 2 years, with top sales and deployment results.
projects.content: NFT Studio is a top-tier development studio specializing in Web3, NFT, and blockchain projects. In just two years, we've delivered over 250 projects for clients worldwide, ranging from NFT collections and marketplaces to advanced DeFi applications. Our team is recognized for innovation, reliability, and achieving top positions in NFT sales and deployments. We provide end-to-end solutions, from smart contract audits to creative design and marketing, helping businesses and collectors thrive in the new digital economy.
projects.contribution: As Founder, I set the strategic vision, led solution architecture, conducted smart contract audits, and built a world-class team.
projects.goals: To deliver the best Web3 and NFT solutions for businesses and collectors worldwide.

projects.title: Genisys – Crypto Messenger & P2E Platform
projects.description: A multifunctional app for crypto investors: messenger, crypto trading, and P2E games—all in one. Rapidly growing audience in Telegram.
projects.content: Genisys is an innovative application for crypto investors, combining a secure messenger, integrated crypto trading, and play-to-earn (P2E) games. Built for King and targeting a global audience, Genisys features encrypted chats, in-app trading, and engaging game mechanics with real rewards. The platform is quickly gaining traction in Telegram, offering a unique ecosystem for communication, investment, and entertainment in the crypto space.
projects.contribution: As CTO, I designed the app architecture, led Telegram integration, and managed the development of trading and gaming modules.
projects.goals: To create the ultimate all-in-one platform for crypto investors and gamers.

projects.title: OpenAI – Blockchain Developer
projects.description: Lead blockchain developer for OpenAI. Integrated smart contracts and Web3 into a world-class AI ecosystem, setting new standards for transparency and automation.
projects.content: As a lead blockchain developer for OpenAI, I was responsible for designing and integrating blockchain solutions into the AI ecosystem. My work focused on enhancing transparency, security, and scalability for AI services through smart contracts and Web3 technologies. The project enabled OpenAI to offer new levels of trust, automation, and innovative monetization models, earning industry recognition as a pioneering example of AI and blockchain synergy.
projects.contribution: I developed and deployed smart contracts, integrated Web3 into AI services, and ensured the security and scalability of all solutions.
projects.goals: To make OpenAI's AI services as transparent, secure, and innovative as possible.

projects.title: Clinicrone (Alpha 0.1)
projects.description: Next-generation healthcare platform. Currently in development and launch phase.
projects.content: Clinicrone is a next-generation healthcare platform currently under active development. The project aims to digitize and automate medical services, leveraging AI for diagnostics and patient support. Our goal is to create a modern, scalable solution that transforms the healthcare experience for both patients and providers.
projects.contribution: I participate in designing the architecture and developing key modules for the platform.
projects.goals: To build a state-of-the-art healthcare platform with AI and automation at its core.
